name: Mas que nada
lyrics:
Ô ô ô ô ô ariá raio, oba, oba, oba 
Ô ô ô ô ô ariá raio, oba, oba, oba

Mas que nada, sai da minha frente, eu quero passar
Pois o samba está animado, e o que eu quero é sambar
Esse samba, que é mixto de maracatu
É samba de preto velho, samba de preto tu
Mas que nada, um samba como esse tão legal
Voce não vai querer, que eu chegue no final

O o o o o ariá raio, oba, oba, oba
O o o o o ariá raio, oba, oba, oba

translations.text:
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ariá ray, hey, hey, hey
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ariá ray, hey, hey, hey

But nothing, get out of my way, I want to pass
Because the samba is lively, and what I want is to dance
This samba, which is a mix of maracatu
It's a samba of the old black man, a samba of the black man, you
But nothing, a samba like this is so cool
You won't want me to reach the end

Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ariá ray, hey, hey, hey
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ariá ray, hey, hey, hey

Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ariá ray, hey, hey, hey
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ariá ray, hey, hey, hey

But nothing, get out of my way, I want to pass
Because the samba is lively, and what I want is to dance
This samba, which is a mix of maracatu
It's a samba of the old black man, a samba of the black man, you
But nothing, a samba like this is so cool
You won't want me to reach the end

Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ariá ray, hey, hey, hey
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ariá ray, hey, hey, hey
